name: 鄭麗玲
objective:
本課程將與結合社區力量，透過對艋舺龍山寺周邊人文歷史、社會民俗、商業變遷等，討論艋舺代表性的台灣本土文化。
The course will combine the power of the community, through the periphery of the Longshan Temple in Wanhua human history, social customs, commerce, etc. Changes to discuss Monga representative of Taiwanese culture.
